BarPosition.Name: Bonus Bar Position
BarPosition.Hint: Select where the bonus bar appears on the screen.

ShowNPC.Name: Show NPC Bonuses
ShowNPC.Hint: Show NPC bonuses to players. If checked, the images and the bonus for actors that are not of type 'character' will not be seen by the players.

PlayersPassBonuses.Name: Players Pass Bonuses
PlayersPassBonuses.Hint: Allow players to pass bonuses to other players by clicking their token in the bonus bar.

DiceVisibility.Name: Configure Editor Dice
DiceVisibility.Hint: Select which dice and symbols should be available to add in the bonus editor dialog.
DiceVisibility.Label: Configure Visible Dice

DiceSelector.Title: Configure Available Bonuses
DiceSelector.Header: Select which dice/symbols can be passed to actors.

Notifications.Init: FFG Party Boosts | Initializing Bonus Bar...
Notifications.ErrorRef: FFG Party Boosts | Could not find RollBuilderFFG. Boosts will not apply.
